properties.title: Java date and time API - Download and Installation
properties.author: Al Major

section.name: Download and Installation
section.p: To use Joda-Time you need to download the latest version. The download will contain the joda-time-1.1.jar. Once you add this to your classpath you will be able to use Joda-Time.

The release notes for upgraders can be found here:
Version 1.0 to Version 1.1
Version 0.99 to Version 1.0
Version 0.98 to Version 0.99
If you want to build Joda-Time from source you will need Apache Ant. Simply call ant jar to compile and create a jar file.
Compilation is also available using Apache Maven. Maven is intended to be used primarily as a website generation tool. Ant is our preferred build tool.
